entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Professor Slughorn is the head of the Slug Club 139. He is described as a person who has been married seven times and has mounds of gold left by his mysterious deaths.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville's parents were tortured into insanity by Bellatrix Lestrange and Death Eater cronies. Slughorn is reserving judgement on Neville to see if he has his parents' flair.

entities.name: bellatrix lestrange
entities.description: Bellatrix Lestrange tortured Neville's parents into insanity along with Death Eater cronies.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is known as the 'Chosen One' and has a meeting with Professor Slughorn over the summer.

entities.name: slug club 139
entities.description: The Slug Club 139 is an organization that Professor Slughorn heads. It seems to be exclusive as Neville's parents were members and Harry was invited.

entities.name: aurors
entities.description: Neville's parents are well-known Aurors who were tortured into insanity by Bellatrix Lestrange and Death Eater cronies.

entities.name: death eater
entities.description: Bellatrix Lestrange and her cronies are referred to as Death Eaters.

entities.name: mclaggen
entities.description: McLaggen is one of the students staring at Harry.

entities.name: zabini
entities.description: Zabini is another student staring at Harry.

entities.name: belby
entities.description: Belby is a student who is staring at Harry along with McLaggen and Zabini.
